asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling upper-body character portrait of Big Al, the carnival manager. He is a huge man with shoulders wider than a refrigerator, a thick mustache, and coal-black eyes that seem menacing even when he is smiling. He is wearing a loud, checkered jacket. The scene is illuminated by the garish neon lights of the midway, creating a sinister atmosphere. The overall style emphasizes detailed textures and a slightly distorted, wide-angle perspective.
